name: Go Away Player
description:
This is a game made for Ludum Dare 50 and the theme is "Delay the inevitable" and i decided to make a game where you weren't the one delaying but the main boss is...

so in this game you walk trough a large conveyor belt as random enemies spawn but there are also some items that will be above you!

the games movement is very simple move with WASD, dash with left shift and shoot with left click.

even tho this game might not be the best i still had a blast making it (even tho i slacked off for the most part...) and i will be making updates to this games every now and then!
